name: Split (itch) (Beelzebub, iam_ayze)
description:
The game is a sci-fi game where you play as a reporter who breaks into a government facility to find out the truth of what is going on. Find the keys scattered in the level to go deeper into the world.

In the game you have 2 lives, there are 2 levels, and when the enemy sees you he splits into 2 after a short duration.

Assets Downloaded From:-
Music:- Avery Alexanderhttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUCQAFyjDmGSK68SfQ3iBVQ
Models:- https://free3d.com/ , http://cgtrader.com/ http://sketchfab.com
